apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this couple emoji, showing two women with distinct skin tones (no skin tone and light skin tone) embraced by a heart, is rendered with soft, rounded forms and gentle, warm lighting. The heart itself glows with a romantic aura, a common feature in Apple's emotionally resonant emoji designs. This visual celebrates love, partnership, and affection between two women, offering a tender and inclusive way to express deep connection in digital communication on Apple products.
